roleset.name: place a slipcover on something
roleset.note: SLIPCOVER-V NOTES: Hand-corrected by Claire. Member of VNcls butter-9.9. (from slipcover.01-v)

role.descr: Slipcover itself, what kind of slipcover

example.name: All arguments
example.text: She slipcovered the chairs in white muslin.

example.name: Passive, descriptive...duck?
example.text: [The big, cushiony sofa]-1 was slipcovered *-1 in sturdy washable duck so that the many grandchildren could play with abandon and not ruin anything.
example.arg: so that the many grandchildren could play with abandon and not ruin anything
